discourse_list.title: Request new Rings / Categories by filing an issue

content.content: As people are creating new Rings, we’re getting questions on how to create sub categories under #working-groups or other forum stuff. Please file an issue for this https://github.com/ethereum-magicians/scrolls/issues for now – @jpitts is the only one with permission at the moment, but if we start using issues this will I think help us scale that, as well as give a record of changes. You can feel free to post here in #site-feedback for broader discussion of issues too.
